libs.Hotspot.libs.other_tools.loop¶

libs.Hotspot.libs.other_tools.loop(a, level, parass, ret={}, thing_to_do=None, **args)¶

Typical usage:

paras = {‘pouet’:2, ‘pouic’:4}

a = {‘pouet’:[0, 1], ‘pouic’:[10, 11]}

args = {‘paras’:paras}

def yep(paras={}):

return paras[‘pouet’] + paras[‘pouic’]

level = [‘pouet’, ‘pouic’] loop(a, level, paras, thing_to_do=yep, **args)

Mercury
